page.title: 05HEREFORD TECHNICAL COLLEGE
page.content: This is the largest college in Hereford, catering for 1100 full-time and 4500 part-time students. The main premises are in impressive buildings on Aylestone Campus but there are a number of annexes, many occupying large houses which are typical of the area. There are five main departments - Building, Catering, Commerce, Engineering, Science and Mathematics. A wide variety of courses are offered, from GCE O and A levels to farming. Links with the Agricultural and Art Colleges ensure a very wide syllabus range suiting the majority of students whatever their interests. The Technical College also offers a wide range of evening classes and these are attended by many local people of all ages.
